meanings.definition: A person or thing that amalgamates.
meanings.sent1: The amalgamator blended the colors together to create a new shade.
meanings.sent2: The chef was the amalgamator of flavors in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The amalgamator mixed up the puzzle pieces, creating a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: She was an amalgamator of ideas, always coming up with unique solutions.
meanings.sent5: The artist was known as the amalgamator of different art styles.

meanings.definition: A machine or device that combines or mixes different elements into a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The amalgamator in the factory mixed the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The blender acted as an amalgamator, turning fruits into smoothies.
meanings.sent3: The amalgamator in the lab accidentally combined the wrong chemicals, causing a small explosion.
meanings.sent4: The amalgamator in the music studio merged various sounds into a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The amalgamator in the workshop transformed scrap metal into a beautiful sculpture.
